item.title: Uses
item.description: Proud member of Wes Boss’s uses.tech group. Here is what I’ve been using lately: Software: Text Editor: VS Code, Zed - a wonderful new text editor written by the folks who created Atom Terminal: Warp - an awesome AI powered terminal Vim: AstoNvim (my dotfiles) - for when I need to be productive in the terminal Hardware (on the go): Laptop: MacBook Pro M1 Max 16 Headphones: AIAIAI TMA-2 BT Hardware (home battlestation): Desktp: Ryzen 5 2600, RX590, 16GB RAM Monitors: NEC EA244 - still going strong (thanks Alfredo!
